section.title: Purpose of this document
section.para: This document aims at giving the user all the information he/she needs in order to set a suitable environment for the BioPreDyn software framework (deliverable 3.4 / 8.3 of the BioPreDyn project), as long as basic instructions on how to use it.

This document does not describe the architecture of the deliverable 3.4 / 8.3 nor gives details about its implementation; this will be detailed respectively in the requirements guide and the design notes.

section.title: Audience
section.para: This document is primarily intended to users willing to use the BioPreDyn software framework on their own model. Usage of this framework as a command line tool, as a Python library or as an application will be covered. The installation chapter assumes that the reader is familiar with compilation and build using GNU make, CMake, or Visual Studio.

section.title: Organization
section.para: This guide is divided into four main sections:

formalpara.title: Introduction
formalpara.para: A short introduction to the project context, and how the current document fits in the global picture.

formalpara.title: Installation
formalpara.para: How to install a suitable environment for working with the BioPreDyn software framwork on multiple platforms.

formalpara.title: Usage
formalpara.para: How to use the BioPreDyn software framework.
